Utter crap!!

I cant beleive that prince harry and william got slated on tv today for going on the piss with the england rugby team!
Some people should look to them selves before they have a go! sad gets i say good lads and i hope it was a good night and the boaring people out there that have nothing better to do than critasize other people should go get a life!!!

A call for your support this christmas

Hello all and i hope everyone enjoying the run up to christmas!! well sort of lol anyway i will make my point again i am asking for your support for the men and women that are seving our country in some of the worst places on the plannet, i ask you to take a look at " THE HELP FOR HEROES " campaigne, before i go further being a soldier myself i know that the british public are behind us and thank you it is fantastic that people want to help men and women that have either fallen or been injured in either Iraq or Afghan and any other operational posting in the world. We do not ask for thanks or glory as we do this becouse we want to and we have a choice however your support is greatfully received and i know that so many people do support us, when i was in afghan we received care parcels from all walks of life from kids to pensioners and they mean so much to us however as always i will ask you to think about the people that are still out there and the people that are still suffering from the consiquenses of war, your donation could change the life of a wounded soldier or the familys life of a fallen soldier so please if you can help please do! if you cant then please as you sit down to your christmas dinner or open your presents please spare a thought for the men and women that are serving this christmas and after you have done that please have a very very merry and safe christmas. Oh by the way i am aware of many charitys that support soldiers so a big thanx to them too!!!

The details for the apeal are : www.thesun.co.uk/helpforheroes

you will get a wrist band that costs £2 and a further 50p for P+P or you can call,

0906 111 7070 and leave your name and address it costs £2.50 from a bt land line

Merry Christmas everyone and i hope all your wishes come true. Thank you

watch this!!!!!

9 o'clock tonight panarama! it is my regement and i am on it so take a look it will be good!

Do you remember jamie bulger???

Do You Remember Jamie Bugler?

Do you remember February 1993 when a young boy of 3 was taken from a
Liverpool shopping centre by two 10-year-old boys?

Jamie Bugler walked away from his Mother for only a second. Jon Venables
took his hand and led him out of the mall with his friend Robert Thompson.

They took Jamie on a walk for over 2 and a half miles, along the way
stopping every now and again to torture the poor little boy who was crying
constantly for his Mummy.

Finally they stopped at a railway track where they brutally kicked him,
threw stones at him, rubbed paint in his eyes, pushed batteries up his anus,
and cut his fingers off with scissors. Other mutilations were inflicted but
not reported in the press.

What these two boys did was so horrendous that Jamie's mother was forbidden
to identify his body.

They then left his beaten small body on railway tracks so a train could run
him over to hide the mess they had created.

These two boys, even being boys, understood what they did was wrong, hence
trying to make it look like an accident.

This week Lady Justice Butler-Sloss has awarded the two boys
anonymity for the rest of their lives, when they leave custody with new
identities. They will also leave custody early only serving just over half
of their sentence.

They are being relocated to Australia to live out the rest of their lives.

They disgustingly and violently took Jamie's life away and in return they
each get a new life!

Please. If you feel as strongly as we do, that this is a grave
miscarriage of justice .. Forward this email!!!

Cut and paste this into a new email then add your name at the end, and send
it to everyone you can!

If you are the 600th person to sign, please forward this e-mail to:
cust.ser.cs@gtnet.gov.uk and attention it to Lady Justice
Butler-Sloss.

36 questions about you lol

1.)Q. Can you cook?
A.

2.)Q. What was your dream growing up?
A.

3.)Q. What talent do you wish you had?
A.

4.)Q. If I bought you a drink what would it be?
A.

5.)Q. Favorite vegetable?
A.

6.)Q. What was the last book you read?
A.

7.)Q. What zodiac sign are you ?
A.

8.)Q. Any Tattoos and/or Piercings?
A.

9.)Q. Worst Habit?
A.

10.)Q. If you saw me walking down the street would you offer me a ride?
A.

11.)Q. What is your favorite sport?
A.

12.)Q. Negative or Optimistic attitude?
A.

13. )Q. What would you do if you were stuck in an elevator with me?
A.

14.)Q. Worst thing to ever happen to you?
A.

15.)Q. Tell me one weird fact about you:
A.

16.)Q. Do you have any pets?
A.

17.)Q. What if i showed up at your house unexpectedly?
A.

18.)Q. What was your first impression of me?
A.

19.)Q. Do you think clowns are cute or scary?
A.

20.)Q. If you could change one thing about how you look, what would it be???
A.

21.)Q. Would you be my crime partner or my conscience?
A.

22.)Q. What color eyes do you have?
A.

23.)Q. Ever been arrested?
A.

24.)Q. What would/did you name your first child?
A.

25.)Q. If you won £10,000 today, what would you do with it?
A.

26.)Q. Would you date me?
A.

27.)Q. What 's your favorite place to hang at?
A.

28.)Q. Do you believe in ghosts?

funny

A teacher asks her class :

If there are five birds sitting on a fence and you shoot one of them how many would be left!?

The most cocksure pupil, little Timmy replies: " none the birds would fly away at the first sound of the gunshot"
The teacher says: The correct answer is four ..... but i like your thinking Timmy."
Little Timmy continues ." if it's okay , i've got a question for you, Miss There are three women sitting on a bench eating ice cream. The first is delicately licking the sides of her triple scoop. The second is gobbling down the top and sucking the cone! And the third is biting off the top of the ice cream.

Which one is married?

The teacher blushes and answers:
well! i suppose it is probably the one who gobbled the top and sucked the cone.

Little timmy laughs and replies " the correct answer is the one with the wedding ring on but i like your thinking miss!!!
